title: SSRL Strategy Design Program for Collaborative Learning among Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Science Subject Matter Knowledge and Basic Digital Literacy
context.additional_context: Acquisition of group collaborative learning strategies using AI tools and adaptive prompts in a smartphone-based learning environment

learning_goals: Learning groups can diagnose three or more collaboration issues occurring during SSRL processes using AI-enhanced group awareness tools.
Learners can establish SSRL strategy execution plans with over 80% accuracy by applying adaptive prompts.
Participants can design feedback strategies to enhance SSRL levels by analyzing AI tool data in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
